author: dain
msg: Changed version to 2.5-colossus to avoid any conflicts in the local repository.
Added bootstrap module to easily launch a vm without requiring an initial class path setting on the command line or via a manifest class path entry.
Added colossus module which will contain the colossus server binary.

author: chirino
msg: No need to be so verbose when disposing a service.  If we need to find out why something is going wrong we can enable debug logging.
